data.title: Brygghuset Mollösund
data.text:
Food & Accommodation

Whether you're here for a meal or an overnight stay, you'll soak in the charming atmosphere of Mollösund with its salt-kissed breezes and genuine locals.

The restaurant here serves dishes with a focus on and inspiration from the bounties of the sea, but there are other options on the menu as well. If you're in the mood for a coffee break, you can enjoy coffee, delicious sandwiches, and various sweet pastries. Sit indoors or on the outdoor terrace, overlooking the bustling harbor life.

For those looking to stay overnight, there are newly renovated and tastefully decorated rooms with splendid views of the harbor and the North Sea. Just a short walk away stands Mollösund's lighthouse, welcoming sailors and other seafarers. Nearby, you'll find lovely swimming opportunities with cliffs, family-friendly docks, and diving boards.

More to Explore

In addition to food and accommodation, there's more to explore. In a nearby building, there's a shop and café where you can purchase simple meals, refreshing drinks, and ice cream. Take a seat on the pier and watch the bustling harbor life or consider taking some goodies with you to the boat or the beach.

Make your way up to the viewpoint at Klockerberget, where a statue of a fisherwoman gazes out over the sea, and there's a memorial stone honoring those lost at sea. Just below is the beautiful Mollösund church. In the village, you'll also find a grocery store and seafood providers selling the "catch of the day" and other treats.

Keep an eye out for any events like exhibitions and summer music performances at Brygghuset.
